    fig_height: 6

Read Ruth's GPS data via the API

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library("jsonlite")
library(anytime)
GPS1 <- jsonlite::fromJSON('https://client.trusted.dk/Public/GetTrail?key=oGpy6z41mAOjI35p&id=88462&skip=0&count=10000')

```

```{r}
df <- NULL
df$lon <- as.numeric(GPS1$Longitude)
df$lat <- as.numeric(GPS1$Latitude)
df$UTC <- anytime(GPS1$UnixTimestampUtc/1000)
df <- as.data.frame(df)
```
